text:
Lil Uzi Vert is the stage name of Symere Woods (born July 31, 1994). Woods is an American hip hop artist from Philadelphia.
Career.
Woods first received attention after releasing the single, "Money Longer", which topped at number 92 on "Billboard" Hot 100. Since then he has continued to release projects such as "Luv Is Rage", "Lil Uzi Vert vs. the World", "The Perfect Luv Tape", and "Luv Is Rage 2". Four of his songs from these projects have reached the Billboard Hot 100. His album "Luv is Rage 2" debuted at no. 1 on the Billboard 200. He was also a guest artist on the no. 1 charting single "Bad and Boujee" by rap group the "Migos".
